com.application.components

Interface Broadcaster.BroadcastListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TextEditorUI
    Enclosing class:
    Broadcaster

    public static interface Broadcaster.BroadcastListener
    Listener to send the messages and update when necessary to all the UIs
    Author:
    Miguel Urízar Salinas

    • Method Summary
